name: Mazedown DEMO
description:
This is a mobile game so don't worry about the screen  vertical format!

- This is a Mazedown demo with six stages and a boss. It still contains many bugs and changes to be made. You may experience some crashes, but be patient, they will all be properly fixed.

- 

- On your keyboard use as directional arrows to move, use SPACE to horizontal shot and use the up arrow to vertical shot.

- With the joystick (I tested it with a Playstation  Dualshock 3) Use 'Cross' to enter the menus, 'Circle' to go back, use 'Start' to pause.

- Use 'Square' to horizontal shot and 'Triangle' to vertical shot.

- Please give me your feedback on the gameplay and the format of the game, this is the main focus of the demo, so, please, let me know what you find about the game so can make it better :)

- 

-

Play with the joystick, if possible. Thanks!
